sentences.english: Old goat received an Zhenghun reply.
sentences.chinese: 老色鬼收到了一封征婚回信。

sentences.english: One of the biggest online industries in India has been the business of arranging marriages.

sentences.english: The only problem seems to be finding a vicar who is willing to do the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 还有件麻烦事是有哪位牧师愿意来婚礼上征婚。

sentences.english: Journal Zhenghun by my cousin, wronged a lot of money, but to no avail.
sentences.chinese: 我表哥通过杂志征婚，冤枉钱花了不少，却没有成效。

sentences.english: His best friend jakob decided to where ads for his release.
sentences.chinese: 他最好的朋友雅克布决定要为他发布征婚启事。

sentences.english: So, I don't think dating advertisement is reliable.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我不认为征婚广告是可信的。

sentences.english: The universe, he became haining first marriage.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙，他成为海宁的第一个征婚者。

sentences.english: Personal ads emphasized plush homes and pretty cars.
sentences.chinese: 个人征婚广告强调的是豪宅靓车。
